UMass MassMarsh UAS project

Source: vignettes/articles/flight_data_summary.Rmd
flight_data_summary.Rmd

/* Knit with rmarkdown::render(‘vignettes/articles/flight_data_summary.Rmd’) */

Flight goals for U-Net

  • We want to match good years of field data with a rich set of flights. Focus on ortho:mica and DEM at low (or mid) tide, multiple seasons.

OTH (Old Town Hill) 

flightinfo('oth')

Notes

  • Active management at this site
  • Have field data for 2018 and 2021 look reasonably promising (except for mowing in the high marsh). 2025 has a decent sample, but is inadequate orthos.
  • Flights for 2018 are inadequate
  • Flights for 2021 look iffy
  • Flights for 2025 are inadequate

PEG (Peggotty Beach) 

flightinfo('peg')

Notes

SOR (South River) 

flightinfo('sor')

Notes

NOR (North River) 

flightinfo('nor')

Notes

  • We have a crazy amount of field data for 2019, 2023, and 2025 at this site

WEL (Wellfleet Bay) 

flightinfo('wel')

Notes

  • Field data at this site looks great for 2019, and perhaps promising for 2025 (though no orthos). Inadequate for 2023.

RR (Red River) 

flightinfo('rr')

Notes

  • Field data might be enough for 2019.

ESS (Essex Bay) 

#flightinfo('ess')

Notes

  • Active management at this site
  • No field data yet

BAR (Barnstable) 

flightinfo('bar')

Notes

  • No field data yet

WES (Westport) 

flightinfo('wes')

Notes

  • No field data yet
